DOC.brief_title: Thalidomide Treatment Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis ( PSC )
DOC.detailed_description: At entry , patient complete history physical , blood test , ultrasound , complete questionnaire . Eligible patient take Thalidomide 400 mg day even . Patients start dose 100 mg per day two week , increase 100 mg per day every two week maximum dose 400 mg per day 6 month . Patients return 6 month evaluation , blood test completion questionnaire . Blood test perform mailed-in kit 3 month . Patients receive weekly phone call first 2 month bi-monthly thereafter .
